rows.label: qev025105_MSG0001
rows.name: ...You know what this Ackwar jerk's on about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0002
rows.name:
Guy actually claims to be a BLADE. Ha! As if.
...Wait, you're not with him, are you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0003
rows.name:
I showed you my resident registration data, right?
Or do you think that's a forgery as well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah, I bet you little freaks know all about how to
forge something like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0005
rows.name:
Just don't go thinking the rest of us humans aren't on
to you Ma-non liars![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_JNK0010
rows.name: Defend

rows.label: qev025105_SEL0011
rows.name: Prove that Ackwar is a legitimate BLADE.

rows.label: qev025105_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025105_SEL0021
rows.name: Question Gerome about his fight with Duduma.

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0006
rows.name:
You're being played. You know that, right?
The Ma-non are all sneaky little liars.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0007
rows.name: I think that's enough about me, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0008
rows.name:
Tell us about your fight with Duduma, all right?
Do that, and and and it will be my pleasure to
leave you alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0009
rows.name:
What, that? It was nothing! I was waiting in front
of Army Pizza like normal, then she starts ranting
about me cutting in line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0010
rows.name:
I just put her in her place a little. Taught the little
upstart not to mess with us humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0011
rows.name:
I don't know nothing about no suicide, but sounds to
me like she had a guilty conscience. Or maybe it was
some kinda divine punishment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0012
rows.name:
And if you keep bugging me, little Ma-non, you might
find yourself next in line for a smiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0013
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0014
rows.name:
I've had enough of this. Don't ever talk to me again.
Listening to you little monkeys stammer and squeak
makes me wanna crush you like a bug.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0015
rows.name: I'd say that sounds like sufficient motive, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0016
rows.name:
If I follow him, he's sure to noticeâ€”but he might pay
less attention to a human. Would you mind seeing
where he goes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev025105_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to tail Gerome.

rows.label: qev025105_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev025105_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Ackwar to do his own dirty work.

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0017
rows.name:
...You don't mind? Just like that? Wow. Wow wow.
You really are the perfect partner, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0018
rows.name: My work, your work... Why get stuck on labels?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0019
rows.name:
You saw his reaction to us Ma-non, right?
He'll see me coming a mile away, won't he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0020
rows.name:
So you're the only one who can do it.
I'll keep questioning locals in the meantime, okay?
And thank you so so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0021
rows.name: Right, then! Time to get moving, yes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025105_MSG0022
rows.name:
There's a park that way, isn't there?
Maybe Gerome headed there.[ST:wait ]
